title: 原來China Virus 死亡率得5%

replies.msg:
https://www.worldometers.info/coronavirus/

Source


Currently infected : 6,353,210
Mild condition: 6,288,041(99%)
Serious or critical infected currently: 65,169(1%)

Serious or critical: 1%


Closed cases: 13,449,793
Recovered: 12,720,225 (95%)
Death: 729,568 (5%)


Here comes to a few questions

1) Is Wuhan pneumonia that deadly ?

2) Is it worth to implement so much infection control measures to prevent the spread of disease or it is just another government propaganda ? (Say, vaccine injection for money making or virus sampling as a mean to collect your DNA)

一直都有班恐懼撚助攻嫁啦

你估滲透講假嫁咩

廿個死一個都唔多??
一個班房如果中哂就死兩件
知唔知十時傷風感冒死亡率幾多？

quote.msg:
一直都有班恐懼撚助攻嫁啦

replies.msg: 面對未知恐懼係正常，但係宜家有好多emerging evidence 話比我地知唔好怕。

5%其實都幾高
因為佢傳播率好勁
如果致死率高 隻野反而好快搵唔到宿主

主要係可以反發
每次5%
好快冚球剷
5%已經高到pk...

分番年紀會好啲
絕大部份都係80歲以上

quote.msg:
廿個死一個都唔多??

I will update in this post later if there is journals showing the statistic

replies.msg:
反發 is some misconception on the detection of virus, say the sampling method. There are a high percentage of false negative with nps.

Also, the detection of virus does not mean it is infectious. Journals shows that people infected eight days later with mild symptoms usually are not infectious

UNAIDS:
"
GLOBAL HIV STATISTICS

25.4 million [24.5 million–25.6 million] people were accessing antiretroviral therapy in 2019.
38.0 million [31.6 million–44.5 million] people globally were living with HIV in 2019.
1.7 million [1.2 million–2.2 million] people became newly infected with HIV in 2019.
690 000 [500 000–970 000] people died from AIDS-related illnesses in 2019.
75.7 million [55.9 million–100 million] people have become infected with HIV since the start of the epidemic.
32.7 million [24.8 million–42.2 million] people have died from AIDS-related illnesses since the start of the epidemic.
"
690,000/38,000,000=1.8%
